name: 郭志宇
objective: The course is designed for chemical engineering major. The topics explore chemistry at a greater depth and with more emphasis on concepts, problems, and calculations. Topics include chemical reaction, oxidation-reduction reaction, chemical kinetics, chemical equilibrium, acids and bases.
